#summary Roadmap for upcoming releases

= Next version (v1.1)=

To release the next version we have to add the Communications sub section in reporting section, also we must modify the Deliverables section to allow users deliver to us the corresponding files, this can be done via uploading files to our servers or giving to us the link to the file.

This version includes the planning and reporting sections although just the planning section is available for users.
